sentence.Network_en: I believe he is most painfully anxious about Diana.
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信他肯定非常担心黛安娜。

sentence.Network_en: Their first album was painfully frank to the point of being confessional.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的第一张专辑是那么的坦率，近乎自白。

sentence.Network_en: I am painfully aware that staff have a heavy work schedule.
sentence.Network_cn: 我非常清楚员工们工作繁重。

PerfectNetExp.abs: UNIT 10. Going Home_旺旺英语教学网 ... chatter 喋喋不休 painfully 痛苦地 jail 监狱.

list.abs: He was painfully aware that the family was divided in its attitude ., 他痛苦地意识到一家人的看法有分歧.
the paper also underlines some lessons about market liquidity that have been painfully learned outside of academia in the recent market troubles .论文中也强调了一些市场流动性的教训，这些都是学术界之外的最近发生的市场问题导致的惨痛教训。
Progress , it moans , is " painfully slow at risk of going into reverse " ., 它抱怨说 , 进步 " 是缓慢而痛苦的 , 并且有倒退的可能 . "
②He was painfully shy ... painfully shy :令人难堪的腼腆第五遍阅读:查找带介词的短语介词在英语中的使用频率极高,因此英语被称为介词的语言。相比之下.

entry.tran: （用于强调讨厌的性质或情形）非常，极其
entry.def: You use painfully to emphasize a quality or situation that is undesirable.

means.word_mean: 2. in or as if in pain;
